exceptions.tactic: apply step_X_tot in H_trans as [st2 H_step].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2" on hypothesis of type "P /X/ (i1, v1) ->> (i2, v2)".

original: intros [H_sim H_trans]. apply step_X_tot in H_trans as [st2 H_step]. apply HPQ in H_step as [[H_Q _] _]. destruct H_Q as [w2 H_Q]. exists w2. split. - apply simul in H_Q. apply H_Q. - apply H_Q.
